docs.title: Dependencies:
docs.text:
All the dependencies are in the environment.yml file. In order to have them installed, all you need is to have the following installed - Python - Conda

To see how to set up the environment, see the set up environment page

docs.title: Setup environment
docs.text: To set up the environment, one can simply create a conda environment based on the YAML file and activate it by running conda env create -f environment.yml conda activate neuro-ceiling

docs.title: Update the environment from YAML file
Design
docs.text: This page is meant to show the overview and design of the project
